intelligence_feeds.text: Lazarus Group detected moving $2.3M through Tornado Cash on 2024-11-03. Wallet 0x4a9f8c3d2e1b5a6f7c8d9e0f1a2b3c4d5e6f7a8b9 detected sending funds to Exchange A (Hong Kong). Entity clustering suggests link to sanctioned North Korean actor.
North Korean hackers coordinating with Russian facilitators. Multiple wallets showing synchronized transaction patterns. Suspected OFAC evasion through mixer services.
Wallet 0x7b8c9d0e1f2a3b4c5d6e7f8a9b0c1d2e3f4a5b6 detected in Ronin Bridge exploit. $600M moved through multiple chains. Coordination network identified with 12 associated addresses.
DPRK-linked actor using privacy tools to obfuscate transaction flow. Pattern matches previous Lazarus Group operations. High confidence sanctions evasion activity.
Exchange A (Hong Kong) flagged for facilitating off-ramp operations. Wallet 0x4a9f8c3d2e1b5a6f7c8d9e0f1a2b3c4d5e6f7a8b9 received $2.3M in USDT. Transaction occurred 2024-11-03 at 10:00 UTC.

sample_queries: Who is coordinating with Lazarus Group?
What is the threat level of actor ALPHA_47?
Show me the coordination network for North Korean hackers
What relationships exist between wallet 0x4a9f8c3d and wallet 0x7b8c9d0e?
Generate a threat dossier for LAZARUS_GROUP
